summary: Hilarity, romance, and transcendence prevail after a power outage traps six different groups of New Yorkers inside elevators on Christmas Eve.
cast: Margaret Clunie|Roxy Cook|Steve John Shepherd|Taylor James|Lex Shrapnel|Max Casella|Jon Heder|James Roday Rodriguez|Julianna Guill|Juliet Aubrey|Jenny Oaks Baker|Simon Chadwick|David Bamber|Cheryl Hines|Amalia Vitale|Martyn Ellis|Patrick Stewart|Jaclyn Hales|Bruce Carswell|Carlos Andrew de la Rocha|Benjamin Cawley|Gary Cole|Nate Fallows|Shawn Ora Engemann|Christina Chong|Daniel Pirrie|Velizar Peev|Gregory Dix|Rob Dixon|Clara Perez|Owen Davis|Christine Camille Hunt|Lawrence Stevenson|Parker Davis|Marian Randall|Krasen Belev
title: Christmas Eve
